text: Mattias Christer Andersson (born 7 October 1981) is a Swedish football manager and retired footballer. His clubs as a player include Myresjö IF, Mjällby AIF, Raufoss IL, BK Häcken, Strømsgodset IF, Fredrikstad FK and Odd Grenland. == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |2003 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Raufoss Fotball |rowspan="2" valign="center"|1. divisjon |29||10||4||1||33||11 |- |2004 |13||1||0||0||13||1 |- |2005 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|BK Häcken |Allsvenskan |11||0||0||0||11||0 |- |2006 |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Strømsgodset IF |1. divisjon |30||19||1||2||31||21 |- |2007 |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Tippeligaen |6||1||0||0||6||1 |- |2008 |19||2||3||0||22||2 |- |2009 |13||2||1||0||14||2 |- |2009 |rowspan="2" valign="center"|Fredrikstad FK |6||3||0||0||6||3 |- |2010 |1. divisjon |19||10||2||4||21||14 |- |2010 |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Odd |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Tippeligaen |4||0||0||0||4||0 |- |2011 |7||2||2||1||9||3 |- |2012 |12||1||2||0||14||1 |- |2013 |4||0||0||0||4||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career Total !173!!51!!15!!8!!188!!59 |} ==Honours== ===Norway === *1. divisjon top scorer: 2006 *Kniksen award: 1. divisjon player of the year in 2006 ==External links== *Profile at Guardian Football Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Mjällby AIF players Category:BK Häcken players Category:Raufoss IL players Category:Strømsgodset Toppfotball players Category:Fredrikstad FK players Category:Odds BK players Category:Kniksen Award winners Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:Swedish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Swedish expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Expatriate football managers in Norway Category:Swedish football managers Category:IK Start non-playing staff
